description: Insists on only supporting VCE for AMD, which is a broken mess even on distros supposedly fully supported (like Ubuntu LTS). Gave up after an hour fighting with it, then had to do more fight to remove the mess the proprietary drivers created.

Great app with Intel GPUs because QuickSync hardware acceleration works well. AMD not so good. Despite many requests the devs will not implement VAAPI, which ruins an otherwise great app. I have to resort to the command line and FFmpeg to get hardware accelerated encoding to work.
summary: Not so good on AMD GPUs

description: I used this program to digitze some old home movies from DVD... might I say it worked great!

Very useful tool overall. Has helped me recover corrupt digitised VHS footage, saved hundreds of GBs, incredibly reliable and stable. Coming from Windows to Fedora I wasn't aware it arbitrarily needed AMD Pro drivers for hardware encode. Kinda weird it doesn't have VAAPI given Firefox and Shotcut have used for some time. It's been a suggested feature for 5+ years now.
It's overall good at what it's supposed to do - encode video efficiently. UI is options-rich, but a quick lookup on the Net will bring you up to speed on what settings to use.
Movie conversion works well without any issues. Simple and efficient way for movie collection conversion. I haven't found any issues and any missing feature.
i put 4 stars because if would be great if we could use it also for audio files.
Simple and Super
don't waste your time

I spent more time fussing trying to get it to read DVDs (not their problem). Preview is nice to help group chapters and where you might use queuing. I haven't yet found the CLI documentation but I love that it has a CL interface. Ripped without effort without touching the GUI settings. It appears to create a smaller file than AcidRip but that is not of great importance.
I tried it once, about a year ago, use nothing else.

I've ripped a couple DVDs without any problem. Handbreak loads up with the DVD in my drive already loaded as the source. I've just accepted the default setting and clicked to run it. I've tested the mpg outputs and they are fine.
Eventually I'll start fiddling around with the settings. I'm baffled as to its name, "Handbreak."
Can't add multiple files to queue like in Windows version of this program for easy encoding multiple videos, for example from dashcam folder to save 85% space at h.265 codec.
summary: Can't add multiple files to queue

description: OK now,but you can add more format
Has a wide variety of encoding options, enabling you to achieve precisely what you want.
Complete, fast and intuitive video converter. Recommended!

easy to use, comes with everything i need, i install version 1.3.3 from website, can add multiple files to queue, everything works as in the windows version, just not in the same way (diff buttons, menu, etc.), but its pretty easy/obvious to find out.

This backs up all my dvds. Those I have problems with I first rip with MakeMKV and then put that file through HandBrake to convert to MP4 and reduce the file somewhat.

It also reduces the size of videos recorded with screen recorders, as some can be quite large if they go for several hours.

Once one gets used to the interface it is a breeze to use.

Donate a few bucks if you can to reward these guys for their hard work, and to keep these good works coming.
Turns virtually any video format into something you can actually view and enjoy
I recently switched over to Linux and this is one of the apps I immediately searched for my new OS.
summary: Been using this since my days with Windows.

description: I'm a small YouTuber, and I have a editing software that can't read .mkv files, I found this and could actually see the clip! I definitely recommend.
It does what you'd expect but has terrible usability and also completely takes over playback of videos. It also hangs around in the background despite not being open.
see https://handbrake.fr
summary: Newer version is available from developer

description: Tried to rip a DVD. Simple enough? Handbrake couldn't do it. A total waste of my time.
summary: a waste of time - won't recognize the DVD in my drive

description: Great application. Need to have some better names for the presets though. eg BluRay, DVD etc. Average people just need to rip their disks.
needed it for video convertion. it worked

If you're looking to use this for actually ripping discs, you might instead check out MakeMKV and then use Handbrake only for converting the MKV into a smaller format. There's probably some magic that can be done to get HandBrake to actually rip the file from the disc but using MakeMKV in combination with HandBrake is easier in my opinion.
Ideal for subbing

my usb video player only plays mpg or avi formats but handbrake cant convert to any mpg or avi or vob formats. so i have to waste time use handbrake convert mkv to mp4 then use winff to convert again to mpg. handbrake cant do directly. In windows formt factory was easy to do this.
summary: cant convert to avi or mpg format

description: Jumped over to Ubuntu from windows, so far the only thing I hate other than lack of full game support is No gpu encoding support (nvenc).
I've installed on different devices; even with oddly formatted DVDs, it works like a charm.
Tried many converters, this is the easiest to use.
Will Smith recommended garbage, LMAO. No thanks

I use Handbrake for encoding ALL my videos. But i have to
split in Avidemux first [sometimes mkvtoolnix, when
avidemux loses the subtitiles].

PLEASE put the avidemux "point A", "point B" marking &
splitting in handbrake ! Then I'll give 5 stars.

this is awesome work the thing that made me tired while working on adding videos subtitels .so i have more than 180 videos that i need to burn and add it's subtitels in the current method i can not select more than one video and its subtitel so i have to select only one video and it's subtitel and add it to the queue and then choose another video and subtitel and add to the queue so this is frustration process .
the right thing that it should allow user to select more than one video as list then add the subtitels also as list with condition that each of videos and corrosponding subtitels must have the same names then click start coonverting .
hope this feature be added as soon as posiible 
that is why i rate 4 stars
didnt work to add subtitles and runs in background all the time without being requested,
summary: didnt work to add subtitles and runs in background all the time

description: apres conversion pas d'audio dans la video
It helps to compress any kind of video to many different formats.
Handbrake on F33 was ok, but on F34 something's wrong with audio. Converted videos have no sound.
Very user friendly and efficient
Just works and usability is idiot-proof!
summary: Get's the job done and easy to use!

description: Super App! Best!
Media conversion is really simple with handbreake
Works great even on Raspberry Pi! Thanks!
I use this to convert videos works great!
I have used this app for all of my videos on Windows, MacOS and Linux I just love this app.
Appliaction does not work after upgrade to Ubuntu 21.10. Worked fine on 21.04.
This is working flawlesslly with my NVIDIA GPU and my primary use for it. Saving so much space!
summary: HW Acceleration working awesome with NVENC and a quadro p2000

description: I end up installing this game on every OS. It's only a matter of time...
Made my netflix work. This is all i needed
It works, has tons of output optons, can do batch and has an easy to use interface. I have used this on Mint, Windows, Kali and Ubuntu and it has always worked well.
does the job, love it
Simple, effective and !fast!
summary: Simple the best in the universe!

description:
Pros: Reliable, many (useful) options, and cross-platform, and a comprehensive graphical UI that saves me from learning the entire ffmpeg command line. Transcoding queues are automatically reloaded if you quit the program before finishing transcoding and can also be saved as JSON files.

Minor cons: Could do a bit more to promote WebM usage (i.e. there don't seem to be any WebM presets; only MP4 and vanilla MKV presets). Some options could be labeled better (e.g. deinterlacing/decombing filters or VP9 quality scale).

I mean, it works

But why is there only webm, mkv, & m4v ??

I've used this so many times to convert videos to .webm/.ogg formats. Recommended!

– TD
neben Avidemux ein Must Have auf jedem Rechner...einfach zu bedienen und arbeitet zuverlässig, bei jeder Videoumwandlung
Gibt keinen Besseren...

Sehr vielseitiges Programm mit extrem großem Funktionsumfang und exzellenter Entwicklermannschaft.
Achtung in der aktuellen Version ist ein Bug beim Einbrennen von Untertiteln, der erst ab Release-Version 1.4 behoben wird (oder von GitHub als Vorab-Version selber kompiliert werden muss). Es wird ab dem 100sten Untertitel-Loop der letzte Buchstabe abgeschnitten.
Stabil, regelmäßig gepflegt, sehr gute Bedienbarkeit, vielseitig konfigurierbar, plattformübergreifend. Was will man mehr?
summary: Seit vielen Jahren das beste Programm zum Kodieren von Videos

description: benutze es sehr oft video und ton umzuwandeln. sehr gut und nutze es sehr gerne weil es sehr zuverlässig läuft.

Lo uso desde Win10 y sin dudas es el mejor.
Vale la pena aprender como funciona.
faster than adobe, much more customizable than final Cut pro drido
summary: The best one, in osx and linux

description: Es genial puede extraer película de un DVD y juntarla esta muy bien. La recomiendo.
summary: La aplicación es mucho mejor que cualquier otra que aya probado

description: Es genial para optimizar videos.
Una extraordinaria herramienta para recodificar vídeo. Muy estable y con montones de ajustes multiplican su utilidad.
De las mejores que vas a ver, realmente funciona!!
Se cierra al abrir archivos de video en Xubuntu 20.04.2 LTS
Tenía varios archivos de DVD antiguos y quería pasarlos a formato de vídeo normal y con este programa queda bastante bien.
Super pour se faire une copie sur disque dur de ses DVD, Blue rays, ... Quelques réglages ne sont pas des plus intuitifs (il est possible de bidouiller beaucoup de paramètres)
Application fonctionnel et efficace... . :-)
Très complet en terme de fonctionnalités pour les plus pointus.
summary: Facile à utiliser tout en étant complet

description:
Fait déjà du bon boutot avec les options par défaut. Permet de modifier et d'adapter facilement.

Merci

Simple d'utilisation, on peut tout choisir, format vidéo, échantillonnage audio, filtre. Vraiment le top.
Fonctionne très bien sous Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.
Efficace et plein de format.
nothing to be done with
Справляется со своими задачами хорошо.
Незнаю. Не получается установить(

Один из лучших конвертеров видео.
Пользуюсь им и в Windows и в Linux
В Windows он конечно на порядок лучше, поудобнее что ли.
Если не устанавливается или (не работает) через центр приложений, 
можно установить через менеджер пакетов Synaptic
Не всегда верно разрезает видео. Пришлось конвертировать с запасом, а не нужное уже потом обрезать ffmpeg.
Удобно быстро перекодировать/сжать файл =)
